backend/main.mo: Defines the core canister with storage, authorization, and data models for destinations, packages, flights, bookings, user profiles, contacts, blog posts, and testimonials.
backend/migration.mo: Contains a no-op migration function that returns the previous state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence metadata mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short prewritten summaries for various frontend source files, mainly UI components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and OKLCH-themed CSS variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the root element and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling routing, authentication state, theming, and global UI elements.
frontend/src/components/FlightSearchResu: Displays flight search results with booking dialogs, authentication checks, and formatted flight details.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with contact information and a credits section.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Navigation header with authentication handling, mobile menu, and conditional admin/user links.
frontend/src/components/PackageDetailsDi: Dialog showing detailed travel package info including image, price, and description.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting users to enter and save their profile details via a form submission.
frontend/src/components/TopBar.tsx: Top banner displaying marketing text and a WhatsApp contact link.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppButton.t: Floating WhatsApp button linking to an enquiry chat.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the backend actor, updating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity context provider and hook managing login state and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for user profiles, destinations, packages, admin checks, and other backend interactions.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with theme variables, dark mode values, and base typography styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React root and wraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin interface for managing destinations, packages, flights, and viewing contacts with form handling and backend mutations.
frontend/src/pages/BookingsPage.tsx: Displays authenticated users' flight bookings with status formatting and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact form that validates user input and opens a WhatsApp enquiry link.
frontend/src/pages/EnquiryPage.tsx: Simple enquiry form that builds and opens a WhatsApp message after validating inputs.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home landing page showing destinations, packages, and blogs, and includes flight search with results handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the hash.
frontend/src/utils/whatsappLinkBuilder.t: Builds a WhatsApp wa.me link with a pre-filled enquiry message using optional user data.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, spacing, shadows, keyframes, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata describing the projectâ€™s state, features, issues, and requirements for WhatsApp enquiry flow updates.
